verbose_text: Here we report the therapeutic potential of a novel formula of tacrolimus eyedrop i.e., 0.03% tacrolimus dissolved in F4H5, in mouse models of uveitis, including the endotoxin induced uveitis (EIU), a model of human anterior uveitis, and retinal antigen peptide induced experimental autoimmune uveoretinitis (EAU), a model of human posterior uveitis.
evidence: endotoxin induced uveitis (EIU), a model of human anterior uveitis, and retinal antigen
